price: Abͻfoͻ no kaa sε: ‘’Onyankopͻn ahyεdeε na εyε wo nwanwa? Onyankopͻn ahummͻborͻ ne Ne nhyira wͻ mo so, efie ha foͻ. Nokorε sε, Ɔne Ayeyie Hene ne Animuoyam Hene no.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَتَعۡجَبِينَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۖ رَحۡمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَٰتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٞ مَّجِيدٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū ataʿjabīna min amri al-lahi raḥmatu al-lahi wabarakātuhu ʿalaykum ahla al-bayti innahu ḥamīdun majīdun
